stories.text:
I'm trying to keep this as vague as possible, but i have been pushed out of a company I co-founded and have deep ties to, tech/dev wise. I am still being used in a massive media attention around my area of involvement, without my own involvement or agreement. The whole company is being rebuild without me, Machiavellian style

What are my options?
stories.title: My CEO is off the rails – what are my options as a co-founder?
How to Build an App That Supports Wildcard and Custom Domains with SSL on Heroku
The world’s biggest companies are breaking apart. Here’s why

stories.text:
Hey all, so right now I'm in the process of assisting my brother in finding a university that offers Computer Science related major and also an audio engineering/production or music related minor.

So far I have: Berklee NYU Northwestern University of Southern California

Your suggestions are greatly appreciated. Thank you in advance!
stories.title: Ask HN: Best universities for CS major and audio engineering/production minor
